headline: Host Hotels & Resorts Publishes 2025 Corporate Responsibility Report
summary: BETHESDA, Md., Aug. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust (“REIT”), published its 2025 Corporate Responsibility (CR) Report. The report provides a comprehensive overview of the Company’s CR strategy and performance—highlighting industry leadership and sustained progress toward its 2030 environmental and social targets, which support its 2050 net positive vision. “At Host, our work is guide
